Articles.Content:
So I thought this months I could do the new star system, but I've had more vacations than planned, something that's nice, but meaning no modding.

The next 3 weeks ahed I'll try to create an unpolished version of a new n2 system, with a red dwarf (Thank you Proxima b) and a yellow or white main sequence star.

I'm sad I couldn't create the original n2 system in a normal amount of time. Sorry for all that were waiting for it.

Hi, I'm not sure if I wanna bother anyone with it, but how much of work is it to make this mod work on a ongoing career game? I'm a little bit worried about the save, since I haven't been very nice to it with all the other mods, but so far everything "works" as it intended ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif ":)") So if I were to add this one, I guess I'd have to edit all the orbits of vessels in the save file? I'm kinda lazy, I'm sorry about that, but I don't really want to experiment, so what exactly would I have to change?

Thanks for an answer in advance ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif ":)")

Edit: OK, I did a little bit of research and I think the only thing I'd need to change in ORBIT of every vessel would be REF which is a code for celestial body vessel orbits. But please correct me if I'm wrong..

**Edited <time datetime="2016-08-26T23:26:53Z" title="08/26/2016 11:26  PM" data-short="7 yr">August 26, 2016</time> by lectiuss**
  
Did a little bit of a research and I'm not that stupid (still a lot though..)

> 
> 
> 20 hours ago, lectiuss said:
> 
> 
> Hi, I'm not sure if I wanna bother anyone with it, but how much of work is it to make this mod work on a ongoing career game? I'm a little bit worried about the save, since I haven't been very nice to it with all the other mods, but so far everything "works" as it intended ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif ":)") So if I were to add this one, I guess I'd have to edit all the orbits of vessels in the save file? I'm kinda lazy, I'm sorry about that, but I don't really want to experiment, so what exactly would I have to change?
> 
> 
> 
> 
> Thanks for an answer in advance ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif ":)")
> 
> 
> 
> Edit: OK, I did a little bit of research and I think the only thing I'd need to change in ORBIT of every vessel would be REF which is a code for celestial body vessel orbits. But please correct me if I'm wrong..
> 

It's supposed to not do that, but copy/backup yor save file before you install the mod (Or even every mod you install).

In the case every vessel's orbit is changed, either use hyperedit or notepad to rechange the orbits to where they should be.

> 
> 
> On 27. 8. 2016 at 9:44 PM, Pkmniako said:
> 
> 
> It's supposed to not do that, but copy/backup yor save file before you install the mod (Or even every mod you install).
> 
> 
> 
> 
> In the case every vessel's orbit is changed, either use hyperedit or notepad to rechange the orbits to where they should be.
> 

OK, I will try it then, thanks again ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif ":)")

This mod is compatible with 1.1.3

**Edited <time datetime="2016-09-26T14:48:22Z" title="09/26/2016 02:48  PM" data-short="7 yr">September 26, 2016</time> by Syczek**
Any plans for 1.2?

> 
> 
> 1 hour ago, www2 said:
> 
> 
> Any plans for 1.2?
> 

this obviously needs kopernicus and that mod is being under updating so you should wait for that mod to be updated first, and please don't bother their team, they are already working on it

So Kopernicus has been updated to 1.2:

<iframe data-embedcontent="" frameborder="0" src="https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/index.php?/topic/140580-120-kopernicus-release-1-october-20/&do=embed"></iframe>

So when is this awesome mod gonna be updated?

> 
> 
> 18 hours ago, Nicholander said:
> 
> 
> So Kopernicus has been updated to 1.2:
> 
> 
> <iframe data-embedcontent="" frameborder="0" src="https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/index.php?/topic/140580-120-kopernicus-release-1-october-20/&do=embed"></iframe>
> 
> 
> So when is this awesome mod gonna be updated?
> 

Have you tried it and seen if it needs to be updated?  According to [@Thomas P.](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/index.php?/profile/113164-thomas-p/) most mods relying on Kopernicus should work out of the box without any changes needed.
Yes. Mods that are based on Kopernicus are free of changing when the base mod updates, so they can be used wherever the version you are using. So yes, OW does works know with 1.2

Um, I downloaded and installed it on my 1.2 game (I have Kopernicus and modulemanager.), and the only planet around Cercani was Pequar (With no moons.) and it looked like this:

![ktigiCQ.png](http://i.imgur.com/ktigiCQ.png)

Either it doesn't work in 1.2 or I really messed up the installation, which I'm pretty sure I didn't.

> 
> 
> 18 hours ago, Nicholander said:
> 
> 
> Um, I downloaded and installed it on my 1.2 game (I have Kopernicus and modulemanager.), and the only planet around Cercani was Pequar (With no moons.) and it looked like this:

> 
> 
> 
> 
> Either it doesn't work in 1.2 or I really messed up the installation, which I'm pretty sure I didn't.
> 

I'll have to check it...

Hi !

Im a great fan of your mod (and you know it haha), all in my game 1.2 works well (with last last Kopernicus), the planets texture are great, just a problem with the black line of orbit, stuttering sometimes. 

Good luck for the update !

Xaeterza
I saw the edit thingy on the op saying there's a dev version for 1.2, but I can't find the download link. Or is there not one because it's super unstable and unplayable at the moment?

> 
> 
> On 27 октября 2016 г. at 1:19 PM, xaeterza said:
> 
> 
> just a problem with the black line of orbit, stuttering sometimes.
> 

Try to add "mode = 0" line to Orbit section in GameData\OtherWorlds\CercaniSystem\Cercani\Cercani.cfg. No orbit - no problem ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif ":)")

Hello I just tried this star system modpack. It works fine, but the prima and secunda planets aren't binary with sigmaBinary. It just move them into the sun instead of make binary system. Thus I had to move out the config for making it binary.

Can you fix it somehow? I will try fix it tomorrow, but you know-how better than me...begginer. ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif ":D") I think fix means only rewrite the sigma binary config for that binary system. ![:wink:](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_wink.gif ";)")

Thanks!

Ave! Toonu

Hello. Why Cercani shine so bright from Kerbin ? Can I reduce it to regular star on sky? (that parameter in cfg ?)

**Edited <time datetime="2017-05-27T02:34:07Z" title="05/27/2017 02:34  AM" data-short="7 yr">May 27, 2017</time> by electricpants**

[@Pkmniako](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/index.php?/profile/138569-pkmniako/) - It looks like Other Worlds isn't working under KSP 1.3.  Prior to 1.3, I could run OPM and OtherWorlds without issues.  Now, Kopernicus+OPM works fine, but Kopernicus+OPM+Other Worlds causes scenarios not to load.  Kopernicus+Other Worlds (and no other mods) will load a scenario, but Cercani and its planets/moons are not present.

Just thought I should tell you this [@Pkmniako](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/index.php?/profile/138569-pkmniako/), this mod is what inspired me to create Extrasolar, and by extension, <abbr title="Real Solar System (mod)">RSS</abbr> Constellations. This is really a quality planet pack, you should be proud!

[@Pkmniako](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/index.php?/profile/138569-pkmniako/) Any chance to post a link to the Github repo, so your source files would be available to people?  

Thanx!
Anyone could temporary take care of this mod to make him usable in 1.3??

> 
> 
> On 2/8/2017 at 4:18 PM, Syczek said:
> 
> 
> Anyone could temporary take care of this mod to make him usable in 1.3??
> 

<iframe data-embedcontent="" frameborder="0" src="https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/index.php?/topic/164000-ksp-130-kopernicus-other_worlds-rebirth/&do=embed"></iframe>

your welcome![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif ":)")
